nodes.text:
Witches' Orbs were orbs that could be planted on top of Orb Torches, or on top of their own private stands.
Mother Talzin owned one which she used to look into the future. Maul eventually came in possession of one. Some orbs were planted in the Dathomirian forests around the Nightsister lair.
The orb first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode, Monster. It was first identified as a "Witches' Orb" in the episode guide for Massacre on StarWars.com.
